summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 MERCEDES BENZ C300. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE DEALER MERCEDES BENZ OF PORTLAND (971-340-4573,1605 SW NAITO PKWY, PORTLAND, OR 97201) WAS UNABLE TO DETERMINE WHEN THE MANUFACTURER MAY PROVIDE THE REMEDY TO SCHEDULE AN APPOINTMENT TO RECEIVE THE PART FOR THE RECALL REPAIR, SO THE CONTACT WAS UNCERTAIN AS TO WHEN THE VEHICLE MAY BE REPAIRED FOR NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V010000 (AIR BAGS). THE CONTACT WAS NOT PROVIDED AN OPTION OF A LOANER VEHICLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED TO ADDRESS PARTS AVAILABILITY TO SERVICE THE RECALL REPAIR FOR THE AIR BAG SYSTEM WITH THE DEALER. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
